issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.summary: VPC- Failure to reach VM on public IP - Duplicate BE artifacts

QA system issue fixed. Sending to Dan to confirm if any code changes were made to address this.

Marking as fixed per:
commit 4d34b7546672a3822ab0073f27e5c0a7beba17f5
Author: Daniel Nurmi <nurmi@eucalyptus.com>
Date:   Mon Oct 12 15:49:08 2015 -0700

fix to prevent duplicate eucart and eucabr entries in VPCMIDO when midonet api is stopped at critical section

I've re-run the cookbook on this cloud twice during upgrade and not seen this behavior, will re-open if it's reproduced. 
Thanks,
-M
